${modID}:ExampleCard.NAME: Name
${modID}:ExampleCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This will automatically be used if the card is upgraded. Remove it if unneeded.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

${modID}:ForasForm.NAME: Foras Form
${modID}:ForasForm.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain !M! Focus.

${modID}:ReCompute.NAME: ReCompute
${modID}:ReCompute.DESCRIPTION: If any enemy's intent is not PURE attack, gain !M! Focus.

${modID}:HotReload.NAME: Hot Reload
${modID}:HotReload.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Focus. NL At the end of this turn, lose !M! Focus.

${modID}:NoobReaper.NAME: Noob Reaper
${modID}:NoobReaper.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage to all enemies equal to your Focus + !M! . Heal HP equal to unblocked damage. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:ChargedBarrier.NAME: Charged Barrier
${modID}:ChargedBarrier.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block . NL Whenever you receive a blocked attack this turn, trigger the passive ability of all your Orbs !M! time(s).

${modID}:DefectGod.NAME: Defect God
${modID}:DefectGod.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a Power card, upgrade and powerize !M! card(s) in hand at random.
${modID}:DefectGod.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a Power card, upgrade and powerize !M! card(s) in hand at random. Trigger an extra time when playing this card.

${modID}:StrikeThePoisonous.NAME: Strike The Poisonous
${modID}:StrikeThePoisonous.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. If the enemy is Poisoned, Gain !M! Dexterity.

${modID}:DownBreak.NAME: Down Break
${modID}:DownBreak.DESCRIPTION: Double target's Strength if not zero. NL Otherwise, double target's Weak. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:DownBreak.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Double target's Strength if not zero. NL Otherwise, double target's Weak.

${modID}:BreakingBad.NAME: Breaking Bad
${modID}:BreakingBad.DESCRIPTION: This turn, your attacks cannot deal damage, but instead inflict the same amount of Poison.
